text: Awon obinrin ti won ko sile maa kora ro fun nnkan osu meta. Ko si letoo fun won lati fi ohun ti Allahu s’eda (re) s’inu apo-omo won pamo, ti won ba je eni to gbagbo ninu Allahu ati Ojo Ikeyin. Awon oko won ni eto si dida won pada l’aaarin (asiko) yen, ti won ba gbero atunse. Awon iyawo ni eto l’odo oko won gege bi iru eyi ti awon oko won ni l’odo won lona t’o dara. Ipo ajulo tun wa fun awon okunrin lori won. Allahu ni Alagbara, Ologbon
